channel.title: Blog of smsxgz
channel.description: Recent content on Blog of smsxgz

item.description: About this blog The main topics of this blog will include: - Mathematics: optimization, probability and combinatorics, - reinforcement learning, - puzzles: logical puzzles and primary Euclidean geometry, - algorithms: some interesting problem from Project Euler and Leetcode, - something just for fun. I will try my best to write this blog in English and to post articles as much as possible. About me My nickname is smsxgz. ‘SMS’ is an abbreviation of my undergraduate college.
